channel.title: Comments for Doug and Ruth.com
channel.description: Life, presented as though it were a series of vacations and parties.

item.title: Comment on El Burro del Diablo by Ruth
item.dc:creator: Ruth
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/el-burro-del-diablo/comment-page-1/#comment-6">Lisa</a>.
The burro el diablo pinata is working great, if it is not raining on Halloween the trick or treaters should be getting scared by the "harmless" looking burro!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lisa.

The burro el diablo pinata is working great, if it is not raining on Halloween the trick or treaters should be getting scared by the “harmless” looking burro!

item.title: Comment on El Burro del Diablo by Lisa
item.dc:creator: Lisa
item.description: Well? was it too subtle? Did the Jaws party theme creep back in with the star of the show not working? Was looking forward to the party! Hope everything is ok and not that a mechanical pinata is having technical difficulties!! horrors!
item.content:encoded: Well? was it too subtle? Did the Jaws party theme creep back in with the star of the show not working? Was looking forward to the party! Hope everything is ok and not that a mechanical pinata is having technical difficulties!! horrors!
